scripts.dev:api-only: sam local start-api --template-file sam/template.yaml --env-vars sam/env.json --port 3000 --warm-containers EAGER --skip-pull-image
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "cd backend/lambda && npm run watch"
scripts.build: npm run lint:fix && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm ci && cd backend/lambda && npm ci && cd ../../frontend && npm ci && cd ../infrastructure/cdk && npm ci
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && cd infrastructure/cdk && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:prod && cd infrastructure/cdk && npx cdk deploy --all --require-approval never
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:backend:quick && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:prod:validated: npm run lint:fix && npm run test && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy:prod:validated: npm run build:prod:validated && cd infrastructure/cdk && npx cdk deploy --all --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:fresh: npm run install:all && npm run deploy:prod
scripts.cdk:synth: npm run build && cd infrastructure/cdk && npx cdk synth
scripts.cdk:diff: npm run build && cd infrastructure/cdk && npx cdk diff
